title: Porn & Pong (2008).pdf Gooner
description:
Porn & Pong - How Grand Theft Auto, Tomb Raider and other Sexy Games Changed Our Culture (2008).pdf Gooner

Publisher: Feral House; 1st edition (September 1, 2008)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1932595368
ISBN-13: 978-1932595369

â€œA stimulating look at two of todayâ€™s most controversial subjects. . . . Sure to amaze and titillate anyone whoâ€™s ever hoisted a videogame controller.â€â€”CNN Tech Correspondent Scott Steinberg

No book until Porn & Pong has explored how pornography and video games have influenced Americaâ€™s sexual mores and technological compulsions on a massive scale.

The first Atari systems and their phallic joysticks began to sell by the million along with the rise of the VCR and the modern porn industry. Reality TV skyrocketed the same year as The Sims, and the surgically endowed Pamela Anderson was only outshined by one other woman: Lara Croft.

Porn & Pongâ€™s publication comes at the time of the release of several highly anticipated adult-oriented games, including a new Leisure Suit Larry, Tomb Raider, and the sequel to the most controversial video game of all time, Grand Theft Auto. Author Damon Brown examines how politics, hidden agendas, and financial pressure affect the controversial art forms of gaming and pornography.

Damon Brown writes for Playboy, Spin, New York Post, and the Inspector Gadget column for PlanetOut, the largest gay and lesbian website
